alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 30 at 2:36PM CST until December 31 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Friday to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, and have a winter survival kit packed.
